fields.headline: The Six Nations Show
fields.bodyText: Ian Payne chews over the coming weekend's Six Nations action with Guardian rugby correspondent Rob Kitson, deputy sports editor Ian Prior and Guardian Unlimited's Andy Bull. In today's show, we hear Wasps and former England centre Fraser Waters on Shaun Edwards' half-time team talks and England's scrum-half issues. Plus broadcaster Paolo Pacitti live from Accident and Emergency in Italy and France's Trinny and Susannah half-backs. Click here to play today's show Click here to subscribe free, via iTunes, and get the latest episode on your iPod. For the Six Nations podcast feed, click here. Previous Six Nations shows can be found here.
